patch:
diff --git a/pygments/lexers/special.py b/pygments/lexers/special.py
index b8680b7a..877e8dd6 100644
--- a/pygments/lexers/special.py
+++ b/pygments/lexers/special.py
@@ -35,6 +35,8 @@ class TextLexer(Lexer):
         yield 0, Text, text
 
     def analyse_text(text):
+        # Keep this a low, non-zero baseline so TextLexer is a last resort
+        # during lexer guessing (i.e. it must never return 1.0).
         return TextLexer.priority
